Name: Mini Matches
About the game: Mini Matches is a 1 to 4 player party game. Race, shoot, golf, jump, and compete with your friends across a series of frenetic rounds. Level up to unlock new characters and power up your abilities in the extensive upgrade tree. Play locally or online, competing across a series of wildly different mini games. Use your special ability wisely in each round to out-smart your opponents. Freeze time with Medusa and shoot your way to victory while your friends are stuck; or become incorporeal as WooOOoo The Ghost and slide through the level as if it wasn't there. Unlock new characters and power up your abilities you progress through the large upgrade tree. Put your best foot forward and win in style with a wide range of outfits.
Meta Title: Mini Matches: Mar 21, 2022, It's Anecdotal and Full Overview
